title: PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds (PUBG)
description: A fast-paced battle royale where strategy, survival, and teamwork decide victory on dynamic maps.

title: Hades
description: Fight out of the Underworld as Zagreus with fast combat, build variety, and storytelling depth.

title: Stardew Valley
description: Build your farm, make friends, explore caves, and create the cozy life you want.

title: Celeste
description: A precision platformer with a heartfelt story about overcoming challenges—one step at a time.

title: Hollow Knight
description: Explore a vast ruined kingdom, master tight combat, and uncover deep lore in a haunting world.

title: Among Us
description: Social deduction chaos: complete tasks, find impostors, or deceive everyone to win.

title: Dead Cells
description: Roguelite action with responsive combat, brutal runs, and constant progression.

title: Valorant
description: Tactical 5v5 shooter with agents, abilities, and crisp gunplay—team strategy matters.

title: Minecraft
description: A game about placing blocks and going on adventures. Create, explore, and survive alone or with friends.

title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: Play as a professional monster hunter in a vast open world filled with merchant cities, pirate islands, and dangerous mountain passes.

title: Fortnite
description: Drop into a massive battle royale, build structures, and fight to be the last one standing.

title: League of Legends
description: A team-based strategy game where two teams of five powerful champions face off to destroy the other’s base.

title: Grand Theft Auto V
description: Explore the vast world of Los Santos and Blaine County in the ultimate open-world experience.

title: Overwatch 2
description: A team-based hero shooter set in an optimistic future, where every match is an ultimate 5v5 battlefield brawl.

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: An epic tale of life in America’s unforgiving heartland, featuring a vast and atmospheric world.

title: Call of Duty: Warzone
description: Massive combat arena featuring a signature battle royale mode with up to 150 players.

title: Apex Legends
description: Master an ever-growing roster of legendary characters with powerful abilities in this strategic battle royale.

title: Elden Ring
description: A fantasy action-RPG adventure set within a world created by Hidetaka Miyazaki and George R.R. Martin.

title: God of War
description: Kratos creates a new life for himself in the remote Norse wilds, mentoring his son Atreus.

title: Cyberpunk 2077
description: An open-world, action-adventure story set in Night City, a megalopolis obsessed with power, glamour, and body modification.

title: Rocket League
description: A high-powered hybrid of arcade-style soccer and vehicular mayhem with easy-to-understand controls.

title: Terraria
description: Dig, fight, explore, build: The very world is at your fingertips as you fight for survival, fortune, and glory.

title: Dota 2
description: Every day, millions of players enter the battle as one of over a hundred Dota heroes in a deep tactical RTS.

title: Genshin Impact
description: Step into Teyvat, a vast world teeming with life and flowing with elemental energy.

title: Dark Souls III
description: A dark fantasy universe with faster gameplay and amplified combat intensity compared to previous entries.

title: Portal 2
description: A mind-bending puzzle game that draws you in with physics-based challenges and hilarious dark humor.

title: Counter-Strike 2
description: The largest technical leap forward in Counter-Strike’s history, ensuring new features and updates for years to come.

title: Roblox
description: An ultimate virtual universe that lets you create, share experiences with friends, and be anything you can imagine.

title: Undertale
description: The RPG game where you don't have to destroy anyone. Negotiate out of danger or fight.

title: Resident Evil Village
description: Experience survival horror like never before in the eighth major installment in the storied Resident Evil franchise.

title: Cuphead
description: A classic run and gun action game heavily focused on boss battles with 1930s-style animation.

title: Final Fantasy XIV
description: Take part in an epic and ever-changing FINAL FANTASY as you adventure and explore with friends from around the world.

title: Doom Eternal
description: Hell’s armies have invaded Earth. Become the Slayer in an epic single-player campaign to conquer demons.

title: Horizon Zero Dawn
description: Experience the entire legendary quest of Aloy to unravel the mysteries of a world ruled by deadly Machines.

title: Civilization VI
description: Build an empire to stand the test of time. Explore a new land, research technology, and conquer your enemies.

title: Subnautica
description: Descend into the depths of an alien underwater world filled with wonder and peril.

title: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
description: Reimagine and revolutionize the open-world fantasy epic, bringing to life a complete virtual world.

title: Fall Guys
description: A free, cross-platform, massively multiplayer, party royale game where you compete in bizarre obstacle courses.
